alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 8:26PM CDT until May 31 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cowley County in south central Kansas... Chautauqua County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dexter, or 13 miles west of Cedar Vale, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Sedan, Udall, Cedar Vale, Burden, Dexter, Atlanta, Geuda Springs, Chautauqua, Elgin, Rock, Cambridge, Maple City, Winfield City Lake and Strother Field Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
